channel.title: XML Historical Foreign Exchange Rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) (19 Feb 2018)
channel.description: XML historical foreign exchange rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) from the Float Rates. Published at 19 Feb 2018.
